title: Web Development
description: I am mainly a web developer who specializes in solving unique problems. Have an idea that you're not sure will work? I'll bring you a solution.

title: Web Optimization
description: Is your website loading slowly? Are you buried in plugins and extensions and not sure where to go next? I can provide solutions to bring your site up to speed.

title: Graphic Design
description: Unclutter that web space with a clean, intuitive design. Responsive mobile-first design is always a must to gain a wider and more engaged audience.
